name: Legendary Bacon Undies
description: This is the fabled bacon undies of legend! You shall be IMMORTAL! Well, at least to fire anyway. And have strangely deep pockets too!

name: Afro of Encumbrance
description: Technically this is really just a wig. A very large wig at that. So much that you can't wear anything else! On the bright side, it's so thick it's like armor! Well, kinda.

name: Immortal Loincloth
description: No more will you need to worry about zombie hulks kicking you in the groin! You won't feel a thing with this small item of clothing. Although it protects literally nothing else.

name: plutonium chestplate
description: It probably isn't very healthy to wear plutonium all day... But it looks awesome! So who cares!?
